V & V Store

My first Startup. V&V Store was created by my friend Agustín Vera and I when we find the right suppliers from China.

keywords: finance start-up marketing branding sales

Sobre V&V

V&V Store had around 150 clients from Arica to Punta Arenas. Our average sales ticket was around $45m CLP (54 USD) and our ROI around 70% 🤗

@v_and_vstore

In our prime, we launch multiple contest with prizes to our followes, we reached the 30.000 followers on Instagram!
